field.comment: The rule priority (defaults to 0). Higher priority rules are fired first.
field.name: priority

field.comment: The classification to set on the event (if any). In theory only classified events are considered "handled". A rule can however be used to notify without classifying.
field.name: classification

field.comment: Whether or not to send a signal for events that match this rule
field.name: signal

field.comment: You can optionally override the severity of the event. For example upgrade an ERROR to CRITICAL.
field.name: severity

field.comment: You can change the priority of an event, this is useful for example for signalling.
field.name: eventPriority
